WRITING.TITLE: The line that should be uttered the last episode of pll
WRITING.TEXT:
"People don't care about what's fair. They care about what feels right."

Feel free to add your last line.
EXACTLY! That's what I'm saying. The quality has suffered throughout the years.

I honestly don't think it is. I think it's some of the problem, but not big enough to sacrifice quality. Ever hear of writer strikes? And MOST IMPORTANTLY, isn't Marlene King producer as well??!? Pretty sure she has a lot of say when it comes to PLL.
